1553333.title: Someone else

15533332.content:
You are a student at Crystal Prep, one of the two schools located in Canterlot, and one that many of her students would argue is the far better one of the two.
You were never really interested
in the whole school rivalry thing, instead choosing to keep to yourself and focus on your education.
Unlike many of the student body who were all rich kids who came from powerful and affluent families, you had instead gotten in on a scholarship won in a writing contest, a fact that had earned you some disdain from the other students, most notably a clique formed from a group of girls considered the smartest and most athletic in the school.
Still, you had managed to make a few friends of similar personality and interests.
You were sitting in the hall quietly reading between periods when you felt something hit you and a wave of dizziness overcome you, ending in a fainting spell.
When you awoke things looked far different from normal.
The lockers were now gigantic, and the formally normal sized students were now gigantic behemoths that shook the ground with every step.
You were in shock.
Your brain was struggling to comprehend what it was you were seeing.
A gigantic pair of shoes stepped near you, ones that you recognized.
You looked up past the uniform to see _____ standing above you.
